fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An editorial on Finland’s new prime minister, Sanna Marin, referred to Jacinda Ardern as New Zealand’s second female prime minister. She is its third, after Jenny Shipley and Helen Clark (10 December, page 2, Journal). • We named the Irish actor Andrew Scott in a list of “British talent” nominated for Golden Globe awards (Netflix wins as Marriage Story vies with The Irishman for Globes, 10 December, page 3). • Other recently corrected articles include: Which party has the answer to the big green questions? What will you do about the climate crisis? The parties answer New book claims Albert Camus was murdered by the KGB
